the show went well

Room 5 went well, thanks to everyone that came out.

Many thanks also to Joel Eckels and Chris Pierce as well as Mike Freas, who all made me feel right at home even though I've been out of commission for a while.

Anyway, as of October I will have a bit more free time, so I expect to redesign some of my web sites and finally get around to releasing Pain & Joy properly.

Until then!

yours -

The Axel
